messages.subject: Hemp
messages.messageBody:
<<Hemp is not the same as Maruana (I really can't spell that). They
are plants from the same family.
Hemp is used widely in Europe for clothing, food etc. I didn't realise
it was banned here in puritan-land until I attempted to walk through
customs eating a hemp cookie from the UK. They removed it and
searched my luggage and confiscated all my hemp cookies. My
sons were devastated. We'd made a special supermarket trip
before we caught the plane in London to buy some as they hate
American cookies :-(>>

I lived in Omaha, Nebraska for a year and it grows wild there. Here is
the hysterical part; everyone knows that you can smoke yourself into lung
cancer with that stuff and it won't give you even the slightest of a
buzz. YET the government patrols the skies looking for people trying to
harvest the stuff.

Kris
